entry.data:
SUNNY, BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
